message: Here are some quiz questions based on the text provided.

answers.text: Over-reliance on import tariffs to shield domestic industries

quizzes.text: What is a clear indicator of a struggling emerging-market economy?

answers.text: It can lead to corruption by granting officials power over tariff exceptions

quizzes.text: What are the negative consequences of excessive import tariffs?

answers.text: Giving government officials the authority to make exceptions to tariffs on a case-by-case basis
Implementing strict regulations on domestic industries
Reducing government intervention in the economy

quizzes.text: How can excessive import tariffs contribute to widespread corruption?
